title: Homemade pork and sage sausages
ingredients: ['900g pork belly', '900g pork shoulder', '6 tablespoons chopped fresh sage', '1 tablespoon ground coriander seeds', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon white pepper', '1 tablespoon salt', '110g fine breadcrumbs', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3m to 3.5m (32mm) natural hog casings']
